name: Loop Recorder
description: A loop recorder is a small device that is implanted under the skin to monitor and record the electrical activity of the heart.

attributes.name: Presence of Loop Recorder
attributes.description: Indicates whether a loop recorder is present or not

attributes.name: Side Finding
attributes.description: Indicates the side where the loop recorder is located

values.name: Left
values.description: The loop recorder is located on the left side

values.name: Right
values.description: The loop recorder is located on the right side

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: Indicates the location of the loop recorder

values.name: Pre-pectoral
values.description: The loop recorder is located in the pre-pectoral region

values.name: Subcutaneous
values.description: The loop recorder is located subcutaneously

values.name: Other
values.description: The loop recorder is located in another location
